concept.title: Processing All Unread Data
concept.shortdesc: When you start a pipeline for the first time, the MapR Streams Consumer becomes a new consumer group for the topic. It reads only incoming data, processing data from all partitions, and ignores any existing data in the topic by default.

conbody.p: MapR Streams Consumer originprocessing all unread dataTo read all unread data in the topic, add the auto.offset.reset Kafka configuration property and set it to earliest. For more information about this property, see the MapR Streams documentation. Doc reminder: earliest is for Kafka 0.9.0.0. smallest is for earlier versions, but we don't support earlier versions at this time. - we can delete this note if it seems we won't support earlier versions.
